title: Poster, Olympisches Dorf, 1972
medium: Offset lithograph on white wove paper
inscribed:
Imprinted in yellow-orange across sheet [listed from top to bottom]:
Wohnbereich / Olympics Dorf Manner / Schwimmbad / Arztliches zu den Trainingsstatten / Schwimmbad / Kirche / Theater / Diskoteck / Wohnberiech / Spiel Salons / Kino / International Club / Ladenstraße/Shop in Shop / Zentrum / Tref Cafe / Interviewraume / Eingangszone / Burgermeisterei/Verwaltung / Wohnbereich / Zuzangzuden Sportstatten / Schimmbad / Pestaurant / Bus Terminal / Olympisches Dorf Frauen 
Imprinted in black lower left: black line and above it "50m"
Imprinted in black lower right: 11.71.28
provenance: From the Collection of Dan Friedman
description: Black linear schematic rendering of an aerial map of the 1972 Munich Olympic compound showing residencies, streets, shops and open areas.  Complex is presented on a flat white ground. In blue upper right, Olympischers Dorf. Specific locations are listed on map in yellow-orange with dots and directional triangles.

tombstone.epitaph:
Poster, Olympisches Dorf, 1972. Offset lithograph on white wove paper. 
Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-168
